question: The sidereal month may be defined  as
option1: the period in which the moon completes an orbit around the earth
option2: the period in which the moon completes an orbit around the earth and returns to the same positions in the sky
option3: the period of rotation of moon
answer: the period in which the moon completes an orbit around the earth and returns to the same positions in the sky
explanation: No answer description available for this question. Let us discuss.
